item.title: Stanford Psychologist: The Dishwasher Rule Will Raise Your EQ and Your Cultural Intelligence
item.description: What does how you load the dishwasher have to do with dealing with emotions and cultural differences? Research says there’s more to it than you think.

item.title: My Colleague’s Email Auto-Reply Says She Might Never Answer You
How Did the ‘South Park’ Creators Just Become Billionaires? The Answer Is an Important Lesson For Every Entrepreneur
item.description: A small deal point in Trey Parker and Matt Stone’s original contract with Comedy Central paid lasting dividends.

item.title: This Startup’s Tech Could Help Simplify Our Electrified Future
item.description: DG Matrix’s solid-state transformers can help companies create microgrids by tying together solar panels, batteries, and more.

item.title: Fed Rate Cuts Take a Backseat to Powell’s Legacy at Jackson Hole
item.description: Markets still forecast a moderate pace of rate cuts even after Jerome Powell.
